meanings.definition: To subject (wood or other material) to fire or intense heat in order to dry or carbonize it.
meanings.sent1: The carpenter torrefied the wood to make it suitable for building.
meanings.sent2: The factory torrefied the clay to create sturdy bricks.
meanings.sent3: The campers torrefied marshmallows over the campfire for s'mores.
meanings.sent4: The sun torrefied the desert sand, making it scorching hot to walk on.
meanings.sent5: The blacksmith torrefied the metal to shape it into a durable tool.
